channel.title: Modisland
channel.description: Does anyone have the code for the Modisland? If you dont know what im talking about its the code you type ::modisland, and you go to this island place where only admins and mods can go. Can you give the code and where i put it?

item.title: Modisland
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

It works greatly, but, i want more of a enclosed area. Is that possible for you to do quickly?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 09:08:42 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone have a code for a somewhat small area?

Read full topic

item.title: Modisland
item.dc:creator: @qw445 qw445
item.description:
@qw445 wrote:

Ok, my code is ::modzone i’ll tell you how to make it work

ok go down to ware your commands are located

EX. if(command.startsWith("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { menuMaker("@blu@commands", "commands"); }

lol if your server has the command ::commands then search that if it has diffrent commands like ::started then search the word Starter untill you see someting like the code above

ok under that last } put

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Modzone") && playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 2837; teleportToY = 10209; inwildy = false; sendMessage("CITY OF MOD's!");
then you will have a mod zone…customize it with npc’s and shop’s if you want to and if you get an error tell me

Read full topic
